sentences.en: Drug trafficking operations often frustrated, yellow frame - based Bureau Lebanon, Lebanon in to be incommunicado detention.
sentences.cn: 贩毒行动屡屡受挫, 黄设局陷害黎, 黎“中计”被“隔离审查”.

sentences.en: He was held incommunicado in prison for ten days before being released without charge.
sentences.cn: 在被不予指控释放前，他在监狱里被单独监禁了10天。
那监犯被禁不得与他人接触.

sentences.en: Yesterday she was incommunicado, putting the finishing touches to her autobiography.
sentences.cn: 昨天她闭门独处，对她的自传作最后的润色。

trans.tran_cn: 无法与外界交流的，单独监禁的
trans.tran_en: If someone is being kept incommunicado, they are not allowed to talk to anyone outside the place where they are
